message.content: {"id": "19089", "title": "No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)", "description": "When using the Photon version, the popup menu does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor. This menu should allow for the addition of breakpoints and marks.", "OB": "Right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor in the Photon version", "EB": "The popup menu to add breakpoints/marks does not appear", "SR": "The popup menu should display options to add breakpoints and marks."}
